tp:docstring.p: This interface lists accounts whose Hidden property is True.

property.name: UsableHiddenAccounts
property.tp:docstring: A list of valid (complete, usable) Accounts intended exclusively for noninteractive applications. These accounts are not included in AccountManager.UsableAccounts. Change notification is via HiddenAccountUsabilityChanged.

property.name: UnusableHiddenAccounts
property.tp:docstring: A list of incomplete or otherwise unusable Accounts intended exclusively for noninteractive applications. Change notification is via HiddenAccountUsabilityChanged.

signal.name: HiddenAccountRemoved
signal.tp:docstring: The given account has been removed from UsableHiddenAccounts or UnusableHiddenAccounts.

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: An Account, which must not be used any more.

signal.name: HiddenAccountUsabilityChanged
signal.tp:docstring:
The validity of the given account has changed. New magic accounts are also indicated by this signal, as an account validity change (usually to True) on an account that did not previously exist.
This is effectively change notification for the valid and invalid accounts lists.

arg.name: Usable
arg.tp:docstring: True if the account is now valid.
